verbs.description: [V: snap] [ARG0: most senior executive] [ARGM-LOC: outside the us] says it must solve its perception versus reality problem claire valoti has become snap most important executive outside the us after being hired in late 2015 by ceo evan spiegel she is one of the few high - ranking visible women at the company but says its reputation for secrecy and worries about its growth are down to a perception problem business insider chief executive evan spiegel executive claire valoti us imran khan facebook uk snap senior executive
